title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 r. 202.70.12 - Non-Appearance at Conference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 r. 202.70.12 - Non-Appearance at Conference

State Regulations

The failure of counsel to appear for a
conference may result in a sanction authorized by section 130.2.1 of the Rules
of the Chief Administrator or section
202.27
of this Part, including
dismissal, the striking of an answer, an inquest or direction for judgment, or
other appropriate sanction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
r. 202.70.12. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
